content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = split(md, '\n')
    code_blocks = []
    
    in_code_block = false
    
    for line in lines
        if startswith(line, "```julia") || startswith(line, "```jl")
            in_code_block = true
        elseif startswith(line, "```")
            in_code_block = false
        end
        
        if in_code_block
            push!(code_blocks, replace(line, "```" => "")))
        end
    end
    
    return join(code_blocks, '\n')
end
```
This function `extract_julia_code` takes a markdown document as input and extracts all the Julia code blocks. It removes the code fence markers ("```") and joins the resulting code blocks together with a newline character. The final result is returned as a String.
